title: The science of landing aircraft in foggy weather conditions
description: The Delhi airport has been witness to chaos the last few days with dense and blinding fog leading to flight delays and diversions. The early morning scenes at the airport, some of which include physical altercations between passengers and staff, have brought into focus the infrastructure at the airfield and what it takes for airlines to operate in dense fog conditions.
author: Community Organizer

title: What makes Ram Mandir all-inclusive? Sadhguru's answer...
description: Sadhguru answers all the top questions you might have had in the run-up to the Ram Temple pran pratishtha ceremony on Jan 22. He was speaking to India Today Deputy Editor Akshita
author: Community Organizer

title: Barcelona Sporting director Deco says club still has faith on Xavi after Real Madrid thrashing
description: Following Barcelona's humiliating 4-1 defeat to arch-rivals Real Madrid on Sunday, the Blaugrana sporting chief Deco made sure to convey the club's full backing to coach Xavi and his project with the team.
author: Community Organizer

description: SpaceX has launched a new satellite into orbit that will help improve global internet access. The satellite is part of SpaceX's Starlink program, which aims to provide high-speed internet to people around the world.

title: New Study Finds Link Between Social Media Use and Depression
description: A new study published in the Journal of Social and Clinical Psychology has found a link between social media use and depression in young adults. The study suggests that limiting social media use may help reduce symptoms of depression.
source: Journal of Social and Clinical Psychology
author: Social Media Researcher

title: New Study Shows Benefits of Exercise for Heart Health
description: A new study conducted by the American Heart Association has found that regular exercise can help improve heart health in adults. The study suggests that even moderate exercise can have significant benefits for heart health.
author: Fitness Enthusiast

title: New Study Shows Benefits of Plant-Based Diets for Health
description: A new study published in the Journal of the American Medical Association has found that plant-based diets can help improve health outcomes in adults. The study suggests that reducing meat consumption and increasing plant-based foods can have significant benefits for overall health.
source: Journal of the American Medical Association
author: Plant-Based Dietitian

title: New Study Shows Benefits of Mindfulness for Stress Reduction
description: A new study conducted by the University of California, Los Angeles has found that mindfulness meditation can help reduce stress in adults. The study suggests that regular mindfulness practice can have significant benefits for mental health.
author: Mindfulness Practitioner
